cause.description:
The Khubaib foundations will be setting up a camp soon where various items will be sold at a price less than that found in the market. The funds raised from this will help the balochistan flood victims. We need help in collecting such items.
1. Funds must be raised immediately.
2. Volunteers should contact as soon as possible.
cause.mission: To raise funds for Balochistan flood victims.
cause.name: Khubaib Foundation.
